actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend for three years the provisions of law relating to the business expenses of State legislators.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend until January 1, 1981, the date until which a State legislator may qualify for the income tax deduction for living expenses while engaged in legislative business away from his home district.

titles.title: A bill to extend for three years the provisions of law relating to the business expenses of State legislators.
